descritivo:
Garantir que time entenda a essência cada cerimonia seus resultados 
 
 Garantir que todas as cerimonias sejam realizadas 
 
 Participar todas as cerimonias 
 
 Provocar sentimento dono no time 
 
 Identificar capacity do time 
 
 Histórias
 
 Garantir histórias INVEST entendimento do time 
 
 Os nomes das historias devem ser claros padronizados Ex: “[Vinculo PF no PJ] – Gerenciador usuários” 
 
 Historias não devem ser clonadas não podem possuir conteúdo duplicado 
 
 Backlog (Em conjunto PO)
 
 Manter backlog atualizado 
 
 Manter backlog priorizado 
 
 Garantir que existam histórias prontas para próximo refinamento 
 
 Garantir que existam historias DOR para atender a capacidade do time na próxima Sprint 
 
 DOR
 
 Garantir a existência do DOR
 
 Mantê-lo atualizado 
 
 Garantir que time conheça DOR
 
 Refinamento
 
 Ancora
 
 Garantir que time tenha a Ancora 
 
 Garantir entendimento da Ancora pode todos do time 
 
 Revisa-la tempos tempos 
 
 Participação efetiva
 
 Garantir que time tire todas as dúvida sobre a história 
 
 Para que a historia esteja no status refinada não podem haver dúvidas quanto a mesma 
 
 Pontuação
 
 Utilizar planning poker 
 
 Garantir que todos do time tem mesmo entendimento da história (Mesmo que integrante não vá participar do desenvolvimento) 
 
 DOR
 
 Utilizar DOR como checklist garantir que todos os pontos foram atendidos 
 
 Planejamento
 
 Não planejar histórias sem DOR 
 
 Caso necessário rodar novamente planning poker 
 
 Os post-its devem ser escritos durante planejamento 
 
 A tarefas devem ser inseridas no Jira durante planejamento 
 
 Para não ficar muito trabalhoso para cada história 1 integrante escreve os post-its outro integrante insere as tarefas no Jira na próxima história passar a tarefa para outros 2 integrantes 
 
 Imediatamente após fim do planejamento iniciar a Sprint no Jira

 Ajudar os times a navegar pelas ferramentas softwares ágeis
 Promover autogestão ajudar os times a se comunicar forma eficaz apoiar na resolução conflitos
 Direcionar suportar os times no dia a dia
 Capacidade gestão fornecedores parceiros
 Promover um ambiente cultura melhoria contínua experimentação inovação

descritivo:
Manages implements external internal tools applications

 Researches analyzes resolves problems issues with minimal supervision escalate issues as appropriate 
 Develops implements large or complex projects solutions 
 Works on multiple projects with varying levels of complexity 
 Manages own resources in accordance with project schedule 
 Generates monthly quarterly reports for trackable metrics 
 Regularly communicates shares knowledge with the rest of the team department 
 Participates in team client meetings as requested 
 Delivers informative well-organized presentations 
 Completes work within department company industry standards methodologies policies 
 Consistently delivers high-quality services to clients 
 Assists in establishing new processes procedures 
 Assist in preparing presentations for control owners management 
 
 About You
 
 Bachelor s Degree or diploma
 Demonstrable 5-8 years hands-on experienced with Scrum Kanban methodologie
 Good interpersonal skills ability work with a mentor servant-leader mindset Former experience as a project manager knowledge of software development processes procedures to understand team needs
 Experience as Scrum Master in Fintechs credit startups
 Experience providing facilitation situational awareness conflict resolution continual improvement team empowerment motivational techniques regarding Agile Scrum Kanban
 Must be a certified Scrum Master holding either a PSM or CSM
 Experience managing expectations building trusting relationships partnerships
 Ability to balance several projects across more than one team
 Excellent verbal written communication skills
 
 Desired Skills:

 Demonstrated history of good decision-making conflict resolution follow through

descritivo:
facilitate the (Agile Safe Scrum) ceremonies conceptions inceptions on the Area level Show exemplary behavior of the Agile culture
align prioritize (aligned with Product Owner deadlines) remove impediments of the (cross) activities among different Squads (backlog that depends on more than one Squad to be delivered)
assess the Agile level of maturity of the Squads to propose track actions of improvement
foster the use of (productivity efficiency effectiveness) metrics (e g Cycle Time Lead Time Throughput WIP) within the Squads for learning continuous improvement
provide coaching on Agile practices mindset to all Squad members building guarding an Agile culture of continuous improvement feedback
ensure Squads take ownership of both their delivery objectives as well as their Agile Journey practices mindset
to participate contribute to (internal) Global (Scrum Coaches) Agile communities representing Brazil South America region 
The Scrums of the Squads will not have an hierarchal administrative report to the Area Scrum just a functional report 

Knowledge Agile Experience:

Agile Expert with solid knowledge of agile management practices such as: Kanban Scrum Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) Demonstrable +3 years of experience in Agile methods
Knowledge in Product Discovery Mapping MVP techniques such as Lean Inception Design Thinking Design Sprint
Good skills in facilitating meetings ceremonies
Knowledge of efficiency effectiveness metrics
Experience with tools like MS Azure DevOps Project MS PowerBI Power Apps Mural
Willingness ability to talk to Management Team
Must have a Scrum Master certification (PSM or CSM)
Bachelor s Degree 

Individual Skills:

Analytical problem-solving thinking
Excellent Communication storytelling
Negotiation conflict management
Team Engagement skills identification
Fluent in English 

Preferable differentials:

Other Agile certifications (KMP FLSA SAFe PSPO I PSPO II)
Experience building Highly Performing Team
Knowledge in implementing facilitating OKRs
Knowledge of engineering (CI CD DevOps TDD) security (code binary scanning) best practices
Working experience in Financial Services Industry
Bachelor in Computer Science Administration or Engineering ”

descritivo:
Estamos um desafio incrível para Agile Master no time agilistas para facilitar cerimônias remover impedimentos durante a entrega da sprint fazer gestão conflitos disseminar a cultura ágil nas squads Tudo isso muita autonomia liberdade para criar metodologias frameworks que potencializem a performance 


Nosso Tech Team é um dos times chaves que fazem acontecer dentro da Sankhya Por causa desta galera cheia criatividade muita sede desenvolvimento (literalmente) oferecemos cada dia mais um software completo interativo que guia nossos clientes muita inovação gestão inteligente!


Aqui na Sankhya buscamos novas formas solução que sejam menos complexas autênticas únicas isso queremos pessoas que desejem crescer a cada dia junto a empresa ajudando a gente a construir cada vez mais um ambiente diverso crescimento acelerado 


Topa desafio?

 wewantyou


RESPONSABILIDADES ATRIBUIÇÕES


Ensinar disseminar praticar a cultura ágil para os times 
Organizar facilitar as cerimônias os ritos ágeis (Scrum Kanban etc ) 
Remover obstáculos impedimentos que possam atrapalhar andamento do trabalho do time inclusive questões conflitantes analisando causa raiz 
Facilitar a comunicação a troca informações entre todos os membros do time 
Dar suporte aos times para desenvolvimento amadurecimento dos novos papéis responsabilidades 
Suportar Product Owner na gestão do backlog na maximização do valor do produto 
Auxiliar Product Owner na transcrição itens claros fácil entendimento para time 
Orientar os times no processo transformação para mindset ágil garantindo a evolução do mesmo 
Desenvolver a transparência das atividades do time por meio gestão visual 
Identificar oportunidades melhoria eficiência produtividade do time 
Criar implementar acompanhar tornar acessíveis os indicadores do time 
Acompanhar time utilizando métricas (CFD – Cumulative Flow Diagram Burn down Burnup Lead Time Cycle Time) 




Conhecimento experiência trabalho frameworks métodos ágeis
Conhecimento sobre Ciclos Vida Desenvolvimento Software
Experiência na melhoria processos práticas desenvolvimento software para otimizar a entrega valor ao negócio
Poder influência boas capacidades persuasão
Facilidade escutar se posicionar
Boa capacidade comunicação senso crítico
Comprometimento
Senso urgência
Ser adaptável resiliente frente às situações mudanças
Boa capacidade condução reuniões cerimônias
Ter curiosidade gostar explorar novas metodologias tecnologias 

DIFERENCIAIS


Experiência prévia como Scrum Master Agile Master ou Agile Coach
Certificação Scrum Master (CSM ou PSMI) ou Kanban (KMP I)
Certificações conhecimento metodologias ágeis frameworks correlatos (Lean Kanban KMP SAFe XP)

descritivo:
Work within product teams alongside the product owner a cross-functioning team to create engaging user-centric solutions applications or services that solve the needs of professional farming communities around the world 
Lead the adoption of agile values principles - support agile framework including sprint ceremonies (stand-ups demos retrospectives) road-mapping release planning backlog management (definition prioritization) sizing story estimation for the team 
Assessing the Scrum maturity of the team coaching the team to higher levels of maturity continuously sustainably 
Transform impediments into opportunities 
Providing support to the team with a servant leadership style leading by example 

Perfil | Formação conhecimentos

Bachelor s degree in a relevant field (e g Computer Science Engineering Business) re-quired 

Advanced English (C1-C2)

Demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively with internal external stakeholders 

Prior experience as a Scrum Master in a Scrum (preferred) or agile team 

Good skills knowledge of servant leadership facilitation situational awareness conflict resolution continual improvement empowerment increasing transparency 

Experience in running organizing workshops training sessions will be a plus 

Agile certifications in SAFe CSM CSP PSM PPO or PMI-ACP will be a plus

descritivo: Principais responsabilidades: Implementação orquestra metodologia ágil (Scrum) um player Implementação cultura ágil um time (Squad) Definição papeis Definição ferramenta Aplicação cerimônias Orquestra gestão manutenção guardião papeis cerimônias da atuação ágil (Scrum) Requisitos Skills: Experiências anteriores comprovadas atuação gestão projetos ágil definição clareza papeis dentro do Scrum orquestra gerenciamento atuação do time Conhecimento sólido metodologia ágil / Scrum Preferência por ter certificação Scrum Master Conhecimento ferramentas gestão ágil (Ex JIRA) Experiência validada mais um local atuação Capacidade implementar KPI s mensuração performance (Gráfico Burndown por exemplo)

Planejar organizar facilitar as cerimônias do Scrum como sprint planning daily stand-up sprint review sprint retrospective 

- Acompanhar monitorar progresso das sprints utilizando ferramentas como burndown chart velocity backlog 

- Apoiar Product Owner na definição priorização das histórias usuário garantindo que elas sejam claras testáveis alinhadas os objetivos do projeto 

- Orientar motivar as equipes ágeis estimulando a auto-organização a colaboração a entrega valor 

- Identificar resolver conflitos impedimentos riscos que possam afetar desempenho das equipes ou a qualidade dos produtos 

- Promover a comunicação efetiva entre as equipes ágeis as demais partes interessadas do projeto como clientes usuários stakeholders 

- Buscar constantemente oportunidades aprendizado melhoria tanto para si mesmo quanto para as equipes ágeis 

- Formação superior áreas relacionadas à tecnologia da informação gestão projetos ou afins 

- Certificação Scrum ou outras metodologias ágeis reconhecidas pelo mercado 

- Experiência comprovada como Scrum Master projetos desenvolvimento software 

- Conhecimento das ferramentas técnicas utilizadas no gerenciamento ágil projetos como Jira Trello Kanban etc 

- Habilidade liderança comunicação negociação resolução problemas 

- Capacidade adaptação flexibilidade inovação diante cenários complexos dinâmicos

Metodologias Ágeis: é fundamental possuir um profundo conhecimento compreensão das metodologias frameworks ágeis como Scrum Kanban Lean XP (Extreme Programming) outras Você deve ser capaz orientar equipes organizações na implementação efetiva dessas metodologias adaptá-las às suas necessidades específicas

Ferramentas Ágeis: você deve estar familiarizado as ferramentas softwares usados no gerenciamento ágil projetos Isso pode incluir ferramentas quadro kanban como JIRA ferramentas rastreamento problemas sistemas integração contínua outras ferramentas relacionadas ao desenvolvimento ágil software 
Liderança Mentoria: é necessário ter habilidades sólidas liderança incluindo a capacidade motivar capacitar orientar equipes indivíduos para alcançar seus objetivos maximizar seu potencial 
Melhoria Contínua: deve ter uma compreensão profunda práticas melhoria contínua como retrospectivas ágeis análise valor agregado análise fluxo valor outras técnicas identificação eliminação desperdícios Essas habilidades são essenciais para ajudar as equipes a identificar áreas melhoria implementar mudanças incrementais ao longo do tempo

descritivo:
As Scrum Master you play a key role in LATAM’s omnichannel customer engagement transformation to drive customer centricity create seamless customer experiences You will be enabling LATAM Affiliates in realizing the new LATAM omnichannel customer engagement model locally delivering personalized omnichannel strategies to customers to achieve the desired outcomes 

Your main responsibility will be to organize coordinate activities work packages using agile methodologies to help prioritizing tasks removing roadblocks sharing back knowledge across Affiliates the Network to ensure sustainable scalable execution of therapeutic area omnichannel strategies 

You will be directly reporting to the Program Manager who is leading the Program Management team support Affiliates Network teams on a project basis based on prioritized demand evolving needs 


Key Responsibilities

Help local teams organize their activities work packages in an agile way to achieve their local Omnichannel Strategy deliver on the envisioned outcomes through taking a ‘hands-on’ approach providing timely effective operational support
Provide support by prioritizing tasks agreeing on timelines removing impediments tracking progress as required help to manage risks dependencies in parallel
Enhance streamline local processes optimise the flow of work within the different areas of technical expertise (Channel Strategy Content Strategy Data & Analytics Strategy) to help execution ensure that the final outcome aligns with customer needs is delivered on time according to plan
Facilitate scrum events ceremonies such as stand up sprint planning sprint review retrospectives lead discussions decision-making processes
Introduce use various tools to facilitate workflow such as the program kanbans boards (e g Trello) facilitation tools (e g Miro)
Empower the Affiliate team to work in a self-organizing manner take ownership focus on value creation to develop deliver
Facilitate decision-making processes gaining consensus where necessary fostering an environment of open communication exchange of ideas overall help to create a harmonic productive work environment
Act as a subject matter expert coach to the team in Agile methodology tool usage decision-making process following the proper guidelines
Enable coach agile ways of working mindset practices ensure that the three pillars of scrum necessary for the empirical process approach are enacted: Transparency Inspection Adaptation
Create a culture of sharing feedback whereby best practices lessons learned synergies can be leveraged to drive continuous improvement of the ways of working around the omnichannel customer engagement model

What s in it for you?

This is a key role to enable Roche’s new omnichannel customer engagement vision which will provide you will opportunities to work with Senior LATAM stakeholders Global teams
You will have the opportunity to work directly with local teams enable them to operationalize successfully drive LATAM’s new omnichannel customer engagement model

Role Interfaces

As Scrum Master you will interact with the following:
Digital Customer Engagement & Insights - LATAM
Program Manager
Business Technology Partner
Omnichannel Strategists
CX Specialists
Channel Specialists
Data Stewards
Global
n/a
Other LATAM roles & functions
n/a

Experience & Qualifications
Education
Bachelor s degree (scientific digital economic or business degree) An advanced degree in Life sciences and/ or MBA is a plus

Professional Experience
5+ years of experience in a Project Manager or Scrum Master
Experience in digital-driven business transformation programs ideally with deployment experience in an international setting in the pharmaceutical/biotechnology industry
Excellent organizational skills the ability to work in an evolving landscape with high levels of ambiguity enabling diverse work package teams to reach a common goal
Outstanding project stakeholder management skills interpersonal organizational skills as well as the ability to handle multiple projects priorities stakeholders simultaneously
Strong bias for action initiative in driving the team forward including taking on administrative tasks as needed
Intellectual curiosity integrity with a passion to bring value- ing technology tools to the team
SCRUM Master certified familiarity with Agile/Waterfall methodologies tools (e g Trello Miro Boards) is essential
SAFe certification highly desirable

Languages
Fluent in English Spanish (oral & written) is essential

Skills & Competencies
Competencies
Visionary: You are passionate about the future communicate a higher purpose to Affiliate teams explaining the why the impact created across by driving personalized customer engagement campaigns
Architect: You build high performing lean-agile teams empower them to excel by encouraging them to make bold decisions
Catalyst: You have an entrepreneurial spirit providing solutions removing roadblocks to act quickly upon evolving omnichannel business customer needs
Coach: You motivate teams to foster lean-Agile ways of working mindset practices across the LATAM region help to champion develop digital excellence initiatives

In ition the following skills will make you successful in your position career development at Roche:
Collaborative Network Ways of Working
Coaching
Outcomes Based Planning
Systems Thinking
Customer Centricity
Culture Advocate
Omnichannel Strategy

descritivo:
The Project Manager of Client Services will serve as a critical leader in successfully managing assigned client relationships through effective project management coordination execution Successful candidates must have the team leadership skills professional background in eDiscovery to manage multiple projects resources client relationships in a fast-paced environment 

Service delivery: End-to-end management of assigned eDiscovery matters serving as the primary service delivery point of contact with key client representatives 
Client satisfaction: Driving client satisfaction through maintaining: a responsive service frequent effective reporting efficient coordination of resources accurate timely deliverables a proactive enterprising approach to problem-solving 
Consulting: Provide expert advice on data collections processing review productions with an emphasis on advanced analytics technology-assisted reviews
Quality assurance: Meet client matter requirements with the highest possible quality accuracy by verifying communicating routinely with the client internal stakeholders
Collaboration: Work closely with clients internal partners on project intake design implementation processes 
Provide strategic tactical guidance to deliver best practice for Client Services cross-functional global operation teams
Organization: Establish maintain matter schedules timelines including defining protocols sequence dependencies work effort duration associated resource requirements 
Records management: Maintain up-to-date records for all allocated projects including matter-related documentation time entries
Continuous Improvement: Consistently identify improvement opportunities on internal processes procedures in a solution-oriented fashion

Proven track record a solid understanding of eDiscovery the litigation support space
Project management experience within a law firm corporate legal department or eDiscovery service providers
The ability to lead global client engagements across various time zones jurisdictions
Oral written communication skills which provide a strong confident leadership presence
Keen interest in technology with excellent problem-solving skills with the initiative to research craft creative technical solutions
Attention to detail strong organizational client-service orientation skills
Excellent client relationship skills including the ability to manage client expectations proactively recognize client needs adapt company capabilities to meet client requirements consistently
